name: ID.me Teacher Discounts

fullDescription: ID.me provides verified identity for teachers and educators to unlock exclusive discounts at hundreds of retailers on classroom supplies, technology, and personal items.
whatTheyOffer:
- 10-25% off at major retailers
- Classroom supply discounts (Staples, Office Depot)
- Technology discounts (Apple, Dell, HP)

howToGetIt:
1. Create free ID.me account
